mapper.select: select GROUP_CONCAT(a.a_id) as attentionIds,GROUP_CONCAT(u.user_id) as userIds,GROUP_CONCAT(u.user_nickName) as userNames,DATE(a.attention_date) as attentionDate from zj_users u left join zj_user_attention a on u.user_id = a.user_id where a.attention_id = #{userId} AND a.is_read = 0 GROUP BY DATE(a.attention_date) ORDER BY DATE(a.attention_date) DESC
